
==Booklet==

The release includes a booklet made of four sheets of paper stapled together in the middle yielding a 16-page enclosure.  The front duplicates the cover of the CD and the back features a photograph of the venue.

The booklet features many photographs, both in color and black-and-white, of the band playing on stage and of the crowd in attendance at the show.  The last two pages feature a photograph of Jerry Garcia on stage and list the contents of and credits for the release.<ref>Booklet included with Dick's Picks Volume 34, &copy; 1977, 2011 (reissue).</ref>
